entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:02 PM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -36.9°C

Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 12:00 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
